sen.e: Being installed the head priest of Daigo-ji Temple in 1116 he endeavored for the prosperity of the temple, reconstructing Yakushi do (the temple of Bhaisa jyaguru), constructing the east building for resident priests, and starting Kiyotaki e (the Buddhist Service to enjoy the cherry blossoms).
